title: Drawing
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, on paper
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Design for a lavamano (bowl for washing hands). Atop an Etruscan column base, a fish-tailed sea god crouches below the weight of a wide-brimmed bowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing.
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-366.
